pr_title: Improve the printed columns for some CRDs

timeline.message:
Improve the printed columns for some CRDs

Signed-off-by: Jakub Scholz <www@scholzj.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                            jsonPath = ".metadata.labels.strimzi\\.io/cluster",
          
          
            
                                            jsonPath = ".metadata.labels." + Labels.STRIMZI_CLUSTER_LABEL,
          
      
    
    
  

Would changing it to this work still? :)
timeline.author: samuel-hawker
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,27 @@
                                 specReplicasPath = KafkaConnector.SPEC_REPLICAS_PATH,
                                 statusReplicasPath = KafkaConnector.STATUS_REPLICAS_PATH
                         )
-                )
+                ),
+                additionalPrinterColumns = {
+                        @Crd.Spec.AdditionalPrinterColumn(
+                                name = "Cluster",
+                                description = "The name of the Kafka Connect cluster this connector belongs to",
+                                jsonPath = ".metadata.labels.strimzi\\.io/cluster",

replies.bodyText: No, because the escaping would not match.
replies.author: scholzj

replies.bodyText: And because it's an annotation the value must be a compile time constant, so you can't do using a method to provide the quoting.
replies.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText: Fair enough, I suspected as much, but thanks for taking the time to answer.
replies.author: samuel-hawker
